channel.title: Love (MMO) Open Beta Upcoming
channel.description: With NS2 and BM being delayed indefinitely, the only indie game that didn't disappoint me in 2009 is [url='https://www.quelsolaar.com']Love[/url]. It is going to be in open Beta on Thursday. Exciting, cutting edge stuff here. ^_^

item.description:
Yeah that would be a problem I guess.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Love (MMO) Open Beta Upcoming
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Update on this, the game has become extremely fun and addicting sometime in the past few days.
Most of the bugs that were pissing me off earlier (spawning underwater, drowning, spawning underwater again, drowning, etc) have been fixed, although there are still occasional bugs and crashes. The developer is constantly working to improve the game, and basically posts a message to his community on Twitter every time he puts in new working code. I can’t recommend Beta testing this enough, it’s going to be massive once the rest of the gameplay issues are worked out.

Read full topic

item.title: Love (MMO) Open Beta Upcoming
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Oh…Love doesn’t really involve players making their own stuff as far as I can tell, it’s more like an MMO tower defense, except the AI also has its own base and the only way to get more weapons to defend your base is to steal them from the AI.

Read full topic
